We completed our visit to Austria in the evening and returned to Ankara. Overall it was a good visit.
I would like to share with you some photos I like about the visit. the http://twitpic.com/4tdjc
Today, we visited and saw Salzburg town music, architecture and culture center. Even in Çankaya Mansion,
The Pink Pavilion used by the Presidents of the Republic of Turkey, Atatürk's request, the Austrian architect Prof. Dr. Clemens Holzmeister
Designed by Professor Holzmeister performed important architectural studies in Salzburg.
We visited Mozart's house in Salzburg, the great musician.
We listened to the Turkish Anthem, a piano played at home by composers Mozart. http://twitpic.com/4tdns is
Hayrünnisa Hanim visits Ayvazovski painting exhibition in Vienna ... http://twitpic.com/4tdon6

Turkish students studying in Vienna together ... http://twitpic.com/4TDQio
I am glad to meet you at the official dinner of the Austrian President Prof.Dr. Niyazi Serdar Sarıçiftci http://twitpic.com/4tdrps
Niyazi Bey is the only Austrian citizen to be ranked 14th in the list of the top 100 scientists in the world in "Matter Science".
He has the world's first patent and publications on plastic solar cells. In 2008 he was elected scientist of the year in Austria.
I learned from his notes about his success before going to Austria and I was very happy to be there with him.
It is proud that a Turkish citizen has achieved such important achievements.
Austrian President Heinz Fischer and his wife welcomed us, welcoming us with great hospitality for three days http://twitpic.com/4tdvg6

PM: For me, I believe the dissolution of the House is a new beginning. This is the beginning for the brothers again.
This is the beginning of Thailand to solve the problem of brothers and their families. So I decided to dissolve the House of Representatives with great willingness.
And with the hope that the Thai people will take advantage of this opportunity. To drive Thailand forward.
PM: I realize that today. Many people and families. I have to face the problem of cost of living, expensive food, not enough income.
PM: As long as there are brothers, people and families still have problems, we can not. But at the same time we say that. It's a job we have started.
Prime Minister: Today I have to say that even if we still have to do more work. But we did not start from zero.
Prime Minister: Today's decision to move ahead It is a decision. In what direction will our country go?
Will continue to move forward Or going backwards Or walk around with conflicts through the past.
(Cont.), Which caused many problems of the brothers of the people. That is the real problem. Not resolved.
Prime Minister: Thailand's political system must adhere to democracy, not go out of the way. Do not walk out of the constitution.
Do not go out of business. And whoever comes into the government. Management of the country. We must adhere to the interests of the collective.
(Continued) And the benefits to the country only. The selfishness of the partisans' own identity.
Prime Minister: Some days are the day I work and have success. The benefits fell to the public.
(Continued) That is pride. That is the satisfaction. I am a professional politician.
But many more days I knew that my work was not successful. More than that. Some days, many people are disappointed.
I'm not sure if that is the case. Or disappointed. Please ensure that I have made full use of it. In return for what the people gave me.
Prime Minister: I have confidence in the decision of the people's brothers (the team)

Hello, good day! Here I am, expropriating parcels, lands and apt of Fogade, to transfer them to families in need. It's Justice!
Good evening. I have not been with you for quite a while. I will answer some questions that accumulate today.
Especially, there are many questions about internet. I want to remind you of a few things in this regard.
When these discussions started, I received detailed information from them by calling the TIB directors.
According to the information given to me, nobody is subjected to any force. No one's freedom is restricted.
The private sector will continue to offer its products in the same way. The public will also offer an alternative product for their own responsibility.
My view, basically, should not be a restriction of freedom. Everyone who wants to be able to walk freely on the internet.
On the other hand, let's not forget that the internet is a stormy ocean. Safe harbors should also be available for those who want to protect their ship.
Another issue is the situation of our contracted teachers and healthcare staff. I admit that there are serious strains.
But you also know that this is a topic with many different dimensions. I found that the government had reminded me, I will continue to find.
I have many followers who are curious about the movies I watch. Vision films are of course I am watching, but cinema is not just about vision and movies.
For example, on Sunday mornings I enjoy the classic Westerns broadcast in TRT and watch when I have the time.
A final note before saying goodbye: I pay special attention to not closing traffic in Istanbul or in Ankara, I am using helicopter or sea route.
The traffic congestion yesterday in Besiktas should not be related to us; because I went to Dolmabahçe from Tarabya by sea.
